SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(MAP_SEQ ) AS MAP_SORT , COL_MAP_ID AS MAP_ID , NVL(TOBE_TBL_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_ENG_TABLE_NAME , NVL(TOBE_TBL_KOR_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_KOR_TABLE_NAME , NVL(TOBE_COL_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_ENG_COLUMN_NAME , NVL(TOBE_COL_KOR_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_KOR_COLUMN_NAME , NVL(TOBE_COL_DAT_TP_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_DATA_TYPE , NVL(TOBE_COL_DAT_LEN ,'NULL') AS T_LENGTH1 , NVL(TOBE_COL_DAT_DCML_LEN,'NULL') AS T_LENGTH2 , NVL(TOBE_COL_PK_YN_NAME ,'NULL') AS T_PK , NVL(ASIS_SID_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_SYSTEM_NAME , NVL(ASIS_OWN_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_OWNER , NVL(ASIS_TBL_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_ENG_TABLE_NAME , NVL(ASIS_TBL_KOR_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_KOR_TABLE_NAME , NVL(ASIS_COL_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_ENG_COLUMN_NAME , NVL(ASIS_COL_KOR_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_KOR_COLUMN_NAME , NVL(ASIS_COL_DAT_TP_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_DATA_TYPE , NVL(ASIS_COL_DAT_LEN ,'NULL') AS A_LENGTH1 , NVL(ASIS_COL_DAT_DCML_LEN,'NULL') AS A_LENGTH2 , NVL(ASIS_COL_PK_YN_NAME ,'NULL') AS A_PK , NVL(DTLT_VAL ,'NULL') AS MOVE_DEFAULT , NVL(MIG_RULE_CN ,'NULL') AS MOVE_RULE , NVL(CND_SQL_CN ,'NULL') AS MOVE_SQL , NVL(LAST_MOD_DT_NAME ,'NULL') AS ALT_DT , NVL(CHRGR1_NAME ,'NULL') AS 업무담당자 , CHRGR2_NAME AS CLIENT_OWNER , CHRGR3_NAME AS MOVE_OWNER FROM SMETA_MAP_COL WHERE 1=1 AND TOBE_TBL_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_TTBL}'='%' THEN TOBE_TBL_NAME ELSE '${IN_TTBL}' END) AND TOBE_COL_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_TCOL}'='%' THEN TOBE_COL_NAME ELSE '${IN_TCOL}' END)
AND ASIS_TBL_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_ATBL}'='%' THEN ASIS_TBL_NAME ELSE '${IN_ATBL}' END) AND ASIS_COL_NAME = ( CASE WHEN '${IN_ACOL}'='%' THEN ASIS_COL_NAME ELSE '${IN_ACOL}' END) ) A ORDER BY 2, 1
